description.default: Remix icon is a neutral open-source icon pack with a consistent style and visual alignment. Through careful selection of icons in the pack, the aim is for them to accurately convey their functional meaning.
description.zh_CN: Remix icon 是一套中性的开源图标包，风格统一且视觉对齐。通过对图标包的精心挑选，力求图标能准确传达功能意思。
